00038 void
00039 LocationCache::insert(uint32_t table_id, RangeLocationInfo &range_loc_info,
00040                       bool pegged) {
00041   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00042   Value *newval = new Value;
00043   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00044   LocationCacheKey key;
00045 
00046   //cout << table_id << " start=" << start_row << " end=" << end_row << " location=" << location << endl << flush;
00047 
00048   newval->start_row = range_loc_info.start_row;
00049   newval->end_row   = range_loc_info.end_row;
00050   newval->location  = get_constant_location_str(range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00051   newval->pegged    = pegged;
00052 
00053   key.table_id = table_id;
00054   key.end_row = (range_loc_info.end_row == "") ? 0 : newval->end_row.c_str();
00055 
00056   // remove old entry
00057   if ((iter = m_location_map.find(key)) != m_location_map.end())
00058     remove((*iter).second);
00059 
00060   // make room for the new entry
00061   while (m_location_map.size() >= m_max_entries) {
00062     if (m_tail->pegged)
00063       move_to_head(m_tail);
00064     else
00065       remove(m_tail);
00066   }
00067 
00068   // add to head
00069   if (m_head == 0) {
00070     assert(m_tail == 0);
00071     newval->next = newval->prev = 0;
00072     m_head = m_tail = newval;
00073   }
00074   else {
00075     m_head->next = newval;
00076     newval->prev = m_head;
00077     newval->next = 0;
00078     m_head = newval;
00079   }
00080 
00081   // Insert the new entry into the map, recording an iterator to the entry in the map
00082   {
00083     std::pair<LocationMap::iterator, bool> old_entry;
00084     LocationMap::value_type map_value(key, newval);
00085     old_entry = m_location_map.insert(map_value);
00086     assert(old_entry.second);
00087     newval->map_iter = old_entry.first;
00088   }
00089 
00090 }

00095 LocationCache::~LocationCache() {
00096   for (LocationStrSet::iterator iter = m_location_strings.begin();
00097       iter != m_location_strings.end(); iter++)
00098     delete [] *iter;
00099   for (LocationMap::iterator lm_it = m_location_map.begin();
00100       lm_it != m_location_map.end(); lm_it++)
00101     delete (*lm_it).second;
00102 }

00108 bool
00109 LocationCache::lookup(uint32_t table_id, const char *rowkey,
00110                       RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, bool inclusive) {
00111   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00112   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00113   LocationCacheKey key;
00114 
00115   //cout << table_id << " row=" << rowkey << endl << flush;
00116 
00117   key.table_id = table_id;
00118   key.end_row = rowkey;
00119 
00120   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00121     return false;
00122 
00123   if ((*iter).first.table_id != table_id)
00124     return false;
00125 
00126   if (inclusive) {
00127     if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00128       return false;
00129   }
00130   else {
00131     if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) <= 0)
00132       return false;
00133   }
00134 
00135   move_to_head((*iter).second);
00136 
00137   rane_loc_infop->start_row = (*iter).second->start_row;
00138   rane_loc_infop->end_row   = (*iter).second->end_row;
00139   rane_loc_infop->location  = (*iter).second->location;
00140 
00141   return true;
00142 }

00144 bool LocationCache::invalidate(uint32_t table_id, const char *rowkey) {
00145   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00146   LocationMap::iterator iter;
00147   LocationCacheKey key;
00148 
00149   //cout << table_id << " row=" << rowkey << endl << flush;
00150 
00151   key.table_id = table_id;
00152   key.end_row = rowkey;
00153 
00154   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00155     return false;
00156 
00157   if ((*iter).first.table_id != table_id)
00158     return false;
00159 
00160   if (strcmp(rowkey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00161     return false;
00162 
00163   remove((*iter).second);
00164   return true;
00165 }

00168 void LocationCache::display(std::ostream &out) {
00169   for (Value *value = m_head; value; value = value->prev)
00170     out << "DUMP: end=" << value->end_row << " start=" << value->start_row
00171         << endl;
00172 }

00174 
00178 void LocationCache::move_to_head(Value *cacheval) {
00179 
00180   if (m_head == cacheval)
00181     return;
00182 
00183   // unstich entry from cache
00184   cacheval->next->prev = cacheval->prev;
00185   if (cacheval->prev == 0)
00186     m_tail = cacheval->next;
00187   else
00188     cacheval->prev->next = cacheval->next;
00189 
00190   cacheval->next = 0;
00191   cacheval->prev = m_head;
00192   m_head->next = cacheval;
00193   m_head = cacheval;
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00200 void LocationCache::remove(Value *cacheval) {
00201   assert(cacheval);
00202   if (m_tail == cacheval) {
00203     m_tail = cacheval->next;
00204     if (m_tail)
00205       m_tail->prev = 0;
00206     else {
00207       assert (m_head == cacheval);
00208       m_head = 0;
00209     }
00210   }
00211   else if (m_head == cacheval) {
00212     m_head = m_head->prev;
00213     m_head->next = 0;
00214   }
00215   else {
00216     cacheval->next->prev = cacheval->prev;
00217     cacheval->prev->next = cacheval->next;
00218   }
00219   m_location_map.erase(cacheval->map_iter);
00220   delete cacheval;
00221 }

00224 const char *LocationCache::get_constant_location_str(const char *location) {
00225   LocationStrSet::iterator iter = m_location_strings.find(location);
00226 
00227   if (iter != m_location_strings.end())
00228     return *iter;
00229 
00230   char *locstr = new char [strlen(location) + 1];
00231   strcpy(locstr, location);
00232   m_location_strings.insert(locstr);
00233   return locstr;
00234 }

00240 bool
00241 LocationCache::location_to_addr(const char *location,
00242                                 struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00243   const char *ptr = location + strlen(location);
00244   String host;
00245   uint16_t port;
00246 
00247   for (--ptr; ptr >= location; --ptr) {
00248     if (*ptr == '_')
00249       break;
00250   }
00251 
00252   port = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr+1, 0, 10);
00253 
00254   host = String(location, ptr-location);
00255 
00256   return InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host.c_str(), port);
00257 }
